title: Madonna's son Rocco Ritchie serves up vintage vibes and it's a look
text:
Madonna’s son Rocco Ritchie serves up vintage vibes (Picture: Backgrid)

Madonna’s son Rocco Ritchie was giving off all the vintage vibes as he made his way through Soho, in London, on Thursday afternoon.

The 19-year-old appeared to be engrossed in his phone as he wandered through the city.

But despite the AirPods hanging from his ears, it seems as though the art student had been transported back to the 1940s with his wardrobe.

Dressed in brown trousers, the young star had paired his look with a shirt and matching tie – that was buried underneath a brown leather jacket.

He’d even planned his outfit down to his socks that were a mustard yellow colour poking out from his brogues.

It’s a look (Picture: Backgrid)

It seems as though he’s not afraid to make a statement with his clothes – just like his famous popstar mum.

The teen has shared a rocky relationship with the Material Girl songstress, however, it seems as though they’ve put their differences to one side.

Earlier this year, Madge who shares Rocco with Guy Ritchie, spoke about her home life to Rylan Clark-Neal on The One Show.

Here she insisted she is just like other mums.

He was making his way through Soho (Picture: Backgrid)

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Nov 22, 2018 at 3:30am PST

The Queen of Pop said: ‘I’m like other mums, yeah.’

Explaining how her children deal with her fame, she continued: ‘They’re aware of what I do, they say things like, “mum everyone knows who you are.”

‘“They know your name, how do they know your name?”’ the singer laughed.

‘I just say that’s my job, I’m famous, that’s my work but when I come home I’m mum. We have the same issues.’

As well as Rocco, the controversial star shares 22-year-old daughter Lourdes with dancer Carlos Leon, as well as 13-year-olds David and Mercy and six-year-old twins Stelle and Estere.

Talking about her eldest to Vogue, the proud mum confessed: ‘I’m green with envy because she’s incredible at everything she does.’
